org.apache.juneau.dto.atom

Class Entry

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.dto.atom.Common
      • org.apache.juneau.dto.atom.CommonEntry
        • org.apache.juneau.dto.atom.Entry

  • @Bean(typeName="entry")
public class Entry
extends CommonEntry
    Represents an atomEntry construct in the RFC4287 specification.
    Schema

    atomEntry = element atom:entry { atomCommonAttributes, (atomAuthor* & atomCategory* & atomContent? & atomContributor* & atomId & atomLink* & atomPublished? & atomRights? & atomSource? & atomSummary? & atomTitle & atomUpdated & extensionElement*) }

    See Also:
    • Overview > juneau-dto > Atom
    • package-summary.html

      • base

        public Entry base(Object base)
        Description copied from class: Common
        Sets the URI base of this object.

        The value can be of any of the following types: URI, URL, String. Strings must be valid URIs.

        URIs defined by UriResolver can be used for values.

        Overrides:
        base in class Common
        Parameters:
        base - The URI base of this object.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).
